description: Students explore life in the German-speaking countries through reading, discussing, and retelling narrative texts. The course emphasizes vocabulary building, a thorough review of German grammar, and the composition of short narratives to develop writing skills in paragraph length discourse. Taught in German with some grammar explanations in English. Prerequisite: German 112 or placement by test.
name: Intermed German I

revisions.prerequisites: Prerequisite: German 112 or placement by test.

title: Intermediate German I
